Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I have never been to another Starbucks that has as terrible customer service as this one. Everyone behind the counter is young, and only interested in gossiping with each other rather than doing their job. It seems like there is no one around to enforce that they are supposed to be at work. I have been here more than several times and it has been the same experience each time. Today, I happened to wait close to 10 minutes for a drink that wasn't custom made during a time when NO ONE else was there. My advice to management is to find staff that will actually do their job instead gossiping and messing around on company time.

Reviews.Author: Mcfrancis
Reviews.Content: Pretty good, a majority of the time it's really busy inside. Drinks wise just taste like any other starbucks. Very good customer service though.

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Great service, great chai drink (made just like it should be! )...and THANK YOU for having butter for the pumpkin bread.  The restroom, beverage prep area, and general seating areas were clean too...BONUS!!!

Reviews.Author: JOanne
Reviews.Content: No Drive Thru, outdoor seating and indoor seating is limited and the entire place seemed a bit cramped. I came in relay quick, ordered my tea, used to the restroom and took off since I was in a bit of a hurry but even to get to the restroom was strange from the design of the place.   The parking lot is shared with a few other businesses including some large building, whatever Aristocrat is... The parking lot was pretty busy, lots of people coming and going.   I just stopped in because I was in the area... It's just a place to come in, get a drink and go. I personally wouldn't come in here to study or anything. Good for what it is.

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I frequent this Starbucks on a daily basis (sometimes more than once a day!) Monday thru Friday.  They have a great staff, always friendly and just an overall great team!  I must say that this Starbucks is frequently busy, but they do such a great job with the amount of people that are in there at once, definitely a good experience.  Great store!

Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: It's a Starbucks, so usually it should get a 4-star rating to just begin.  HOWEVER....  The seating area is crowded and to navigate your way to the cashier to order is a mess.  The place where you get your drinks from the barista is also right against the door which means if there is a drink line, then that blocks incoming and outgoing traffic.  Along with the crowded seating area, trying to get coffee here is like trying to navigate an accident where it goes from 4 lanes to 1.  Drinks wise, it's typical after Starbucks had their worldwide shutdown training.   Consistent drinks across the board.   But the whole having to navigate through a sea of people is not really my taste in store layout.  It'd be a lot better to have pick-up on the far end of the store.

Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Small Starbucks in a business park. It's surrounded by offices so it caters to the people who work in those office buildings. It's much smaller than your normal Starbucks, so don't expect to come here and lay out your laptop, papers, food, and spend a few hours here doing work or relaxing.   I'm not giving 3 stars for the place, but for the drinks I've gotten from here thus far. Compared to the Starbucks on my side of town, where my drinks always come out pretty much perfect, and the Starbucks on the Air Force Base, where I also frequent, this Starbucks gave me  okay  drinks.  For instance yesterday I ordered my typical Non-Fat Ice White Mocha with no whip and I left with it. When I got in my car and was going down the road, I took a sip and thought it tasted way, way too bitter. It almost had a sour undertone to it.   I understand not every drink is going to come out perfect, but I've yet to receive a perfect drink from this Starbucks.

Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: When I'm in serious need of a caffeine fix, this place does the trick. It doesn't have a drive thru, so not as convenient as some but sometimes cravings can't be thwarted by a little detail like that. Service is standard and efficient.

Reviews.Author: Ursula
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff! Good location. Very fast service, like Seattle fast! Be prepared for a line wait but you won't be in it long.

Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: Been to this place many times this month and last month. We ordered diff flavor each visit but mostly I love my caramel macchiato ... The ambiance is pretty good, good and sweet staff, very accommodating .. Today we ordered an orange mango smoothie , thought will try something else than coffee and other stuff but turned out that the one we ordered was tasted like banana,and you barely taste the mango or orange so we let them changed to peach tea or something. Thought something else than coffee BUT not a happy camper with the taste, it tasted like  water Foreals , I'm not kidding, so we decided to let them changed to CM and this coffee with vanilla..

Reviews.Author: Cherie
Reviews.Content: I so love the crew at my Starbucks!! Great customer service from Sara, Kat, Kim, Paige, and all the fellas!! They make the best chestnut praline ever!!

Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Today this is the score. Terrible service. I had to ask the guy if he would make my coffee today. I waited 5 mins while the girl was cleaning at the sink in front. I know she saw me but she kept cleaning. Then the guy took my order and she still made it wrong. She set it on the counter said, here you go and turned away. I couldnt see her name tag or if she had one. I decided not to say anything since i was now there 18 mins and it was empty in there. Very upset i asked for extra carmel and received NONE. She also made it wrong but she didnt care to make it correct cuz she was acting mad so.... Ive never seen either of them before so too bad.., ill just go to Target on Sunday afternoons from now on and pay more but at least they will make it right and with half a smile!

Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: Great spot but no drive thru. Got a frapp around lunch time and it actually wasn' t that busy, maybe 2 people in line in front of me, I was in and out pretty quick. Staff was friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: It's called a smile and a warm greeting wouldn't hurt either. This is one of the reasons why I stopped going to Starbucks.   I walked in because I was walking into work this morning and I was cold, so I said why not stop in and grab something warm. Well I haven't stepped foot in a Starbucks in a year.   I got tired of drinking flavored coffee drinks full of high fructose corn syrup. And yes unless it's sugar free all of their flavors have it! I used to be a barista and we brewed all the Starbucks stuff and used their sauces, the whole nine yards. Even was trained by Starbucks on exactly how to make everything. Oh and btw Seattle's Best is owned by Starbucks. But the other reason I quit going to Starbucks is because the people are rude just like their customers.   I walked in standing away from the counter looking at the menu trying to see what's new or sounds good. The cashier yells can I help you like I'm deaf or there are people everywhere. I was the only one there. I said still looking. Then people came in I waved a few by and got in line. I get up there and the same girl says are you ready now? Instead of asking a question about a drink I said grande Carmel macchiato that's it. Handed her my card and then waited for my drink. Watched her not even do the crisscross stuff just a swirl. Got my drink and asked the barista for a stopper and left. Had she made the drink right it would have tasted right. Just tasted like coffee with cream. Waste of money and time.

Reviews.Author: Chrystee
Reviews.Content: This Starbucks is AMAZING, INCREDIBLE, COOL, FUN, EXCITING, FRIENDLY, ETC!!!! I can't even explain 100% in words how wonderful everyone here is! Drinks are soooo good and service is beyond friendly and fast!!! Shout out to Ron for being the bomb !!!!!

Reviews.Author: Alice
Reviews.Content: Well, what to say.. It is Starbucks! Always good, still have to remind staff, ICE FIRST! It's like,  Laces out people!  I can read the manual too I have google.  Every one here is friendly, professional and they seem pretty happy to be honest...  People watching here is good, a bit cramped, but still it's Starbucks, coffee, yummz!

Reviews.Author: Paulina
Reviews.Content: This Starbucks crew is so friendly and outgoing, their customer service is a 5 out of 5, totally on point.  As for cleanliness, I'd give them a 3 out of 5. The floors are somewhat clean, the tables and chairs are clean, the front of the store is pretty organized... BUT the bathroom is just nasty. It looks like it hasn't been cleaned all day, right now it's pretty slow so there is NO excuse for it to not be cleaned.   I ordered a PM Frappucino and it taste like booty. There is way too many pumps of peppermint syrup. I even mixed it up with my straw and it doesn't help at all. No offense to the barista, but yikes. Work on that please, 2 out of 5 there.   Overall, I'd probably come back for the chill atmosphere but not for a drink. It would depend on how badly I'm needing coffee.

Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Slowest location, EVER! I've been to other locations that have been way more busy, with quicker service. I always forget driving 5 miles out of my way to another location is quicker.

Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: The layout is a little whacky but it's in a great location and it's a lifesaver!  I remember my first time in Vegas a few years ago waking up with a killer headache and wanting to eat the coffee grounds in the hotel room because I needed a jolt and a migraine cure.  That's when I first found this Starbucks and it was my savior.  Pretty sure I stuck a straw in a Venti and sucked away while I chewed Advil LiquiGels like they were Skittles.  Anyways, I was just back a couple months ago and frequented it again for a few days.  Customer service has always been friendly for as busy as they are.  Nothing bad to say about them!  Make sure you locate this one the night before so you can crawl over there whenever you wake up the next afternoon.

Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Love it when I have the extra few minutes in the morning to hit Starbucks on the way to work.  It gets quite busy very suddenly in my pasts visits, sometimes from the time I park and walk in the line is out the door.  The crew is always friendly and are quite familiar with a lot of frequent visitors.  I typically get the same drink and rarely does it ever taste the same, but I still always come back..i  do wish there was consistency in how they are made!

Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff and quick! My coffee is perfect!  Breakfast sandwich the slow roasted ham and swiss croissant so tasty.

Reviews.Author: Moby
Reviews.Content: Not real quick but everyone was so damn friendly! This goes for all of the area Starbucks BTW but we frequented this one the most.

Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: It's a small location with very few seats, no drive through and the giant task of taking care of a few large businesses around them everyday. It's probably one of the busiest Starbucks I have ever been to, but they always seem to handle the pressure with poise and more often than not, my coffee is fantastic.   I started working at one of those large businesses in the same parking lot a few months ago and I visit this location almost everyday, sometimes twice. They know my name, my order and even greet me and carry on a conversation at times.   I understand that Starbucks are pretty much the same everywhere you go, but this one is set above the rest by their amazing staff that can always put a smile on my face. Especially in the morning when coffee is pretty important!

Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff, clean establishment, line goes by fast during rush hour. Lots of desk space for working (patio seating as well).

Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: Grande Iced Caramel Macciato in a Venti cup, Breve, stirred, with 3.5 pumps of classic and 2.5 pumps of hazelnut and whip cream with extra caramel ...  I used to laugh at people who used to order like this. In fact, I would go out of my way to clown anyone who could conjure up such a request!  ...and then I got a Starbucks gift card...and then I went to THIS Starbucks...and then I had a drink...and then another...and then another...   Today's standard order:  Venti Iced Black Tea w/ 1 pump of classic and 1 pump of vanilla, no water, with light extra ice (not extra light ice, mind you!)   That was 4 years ago. Today, I can honestly say that I am at once proud and ashamed that I have visited almost EVERY Starbucks in a twenty-five mile radius (My work has me all over town!) and in my humble opinion, no other Starbucks establishment can hold a novelty Frappucino off the Secret Menu to these guys!    How could I have possibly fallen into such a robotic display of consumer indulgence? Am I not ashamed of the obvious routine that borders on addiction? The care and efficiency that this Starbucks locale exhibits was enough to make me answer with a resounding  NO!  Clean, Fast and Cordial and can you believe that they memorized my order so that I no longer have to bear the shame of repeating my ridiculous-sounding tea?   I LOVE THIS STARBUCKS...and I don't even drink coffee! LOL

Reviews.Author: Rally
Reviews.Content: Small but busy Starbucks, no drive thru, indoor and outdoor seating.  Busy all day because of huge number of nearby business offices.  Free wi-fi, treat receipts.

Reviews.Author: Samuel
Reviews.Content: As a Starbucks regular for over 15 years, I can say that this is one of the most consistent and friendly ones I have been to! Staff is all super friendly, even during the very busy morning rush hours. They try very hard to remember every guests name and/or drink, and always use very polite manners.   Only negative is they close fairly early and are almost never open on holidays, but that does not affect their rating because Starbucks' are easily accessible no matter your location.   Keep up the good work guys!

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: You would think that Starbucks would get 5 stars no matter what the location.  This one doesnt.  No drive thru, so you must go in, it's cramped in there, there are very few chairs to sit and enjoy your beverage and there is almost always a line in there!  The drinks are pretty consistent, and its 4 blocks from home , so those are the only things that keep me going there.

Reviews.Author: Mandi
Reviews.Content: There is no drive through at this location and surrounding it are a ton of business centers so it's super busy. When I walked in, the line was out the door but I was desperate so I waited. To my surprised delight, the line went super fast and I didn't wait more than 5 minutes for my drink after ordering. I was very impressed!

Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: I'm a Starbucks partner so I know that some people can be difficult to deal with, however, when I COME IN as a customer I am always friendly and try not to impose. The register partner, an uptight blonde, couldn't wait to get me out of there. Always called out the total so I could pay every time she walked away to go do something. I tried to order food, and did, but she looked at me like I was wasting her time. Thanks but no thanks. The bar partner (Spencer) was friendly and went out of his way to help with whatever was causing the blonde so much distress. (2 stars for friendly Spencer)

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Dear Starbucks,   By the time you read this review, I'll be gone.  I've started seeing other coffee shops, and the last few times I've been to see you...things just aren't the same.   Your staff used to greet me by name, and know my order...now I'm lucky if I get a polite greeting.  I'm sorry to say that the quality of your drinks, while never a favorite of mine, has gone down hill quite a bit.  I can't believe I paid $4.27 for a TALL latte, even if it was your new one, the Chestnut Praline Latte...which, by the way...is awful.  It tasted burnt, and wasn't even hot when I received it.    This is harder for me than it is for you.  We've grown apart.  I wish I could say  Its not you, its me!  but it is DEFINITELY you.    Cordially,   Lisa   ** the non silly version: Service has slipped considerably.  Prices are ridiculous for what you get, and the coffee is disgusting.  I'll be travelling the additional 5 minutes to Grouchy Johns from now on.

Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: I work just around the corner from this one, so I frequent it pretty often. It can get very busy in the morning, and there is no drive-thru, so get out and go in! Otherwise, it dies down and can be accommodating. The store is narrow and long, with limited minimal indoor seating, though there is bar seating along the window and more outside.  Enough about the store, it's the people that make this Starbucks awesome. Aside from their youthful vim and courteous demeanor, they are always friendly and welcoming. I promised to write a review, so here it is. Last night while waiting for my drink with my co-worker, we witnessed some amazing customer service. A man grabbed the wrong drink, and a woman consequently grabbed the wrong drink. She realized waaaay before the man did, came back and said she was fine, but didn't want her drink (strange...). The baristas quickly remade her drink, and the man's, while one came out and told the man his drink was wrong (which he noticed only after they told him, hehe!). They brought the remade drinks out personally, apologized for any inconvenience and everyone was happy. Yay! Talk about going out of the way to please your customers.  I didn't get their names, but the guy was Tyler I think and one of the girls had red glasses. Had to give a shoutout.

Reviews.Author: Faith
Reviews.Content: The staff here is really great, always friendly. They are on their game, and work hard.   I must say, lately, every time I come here, they are literally OUT of everything. Savories, Lemonade for the tea, Cake Pops, etc. In the past 2 weeks alone, I've ordered my Green Tea Lemonade, and was called back to the front because they are out of lemonade. I've received 3 $4 off 'gift cards' in the past week alone. In the past 60 days, I would say that they were out of Lemonade 15 times when I've come in there.   I really love this staff, but I am constantly never getting anything I want from this store. Someone needs to work on the supply ordering! Get it together!

Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: Worst freaking SB! Every time slow and inefficient. Today's experience, 15 min to get a plain bagel and cream cheese. To SB corporate...allowing for mobile ordering of bagel AND cream cheese might be a good option to hide your inefficient workers.

Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Sad about the new seating set up. No comfy seats. One long table along the window. But the high tables block the seats there. Sad face. :(.  Love the people who work there though.

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Not as good as the one on Las Vegas Boulevard and blue diamonds but it's never crowded and if you're in a hurry it's a great place to stop. It's also very nice inside with a lot of places to sit and they have outdoor seating

Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: Great drinks but too small to work at. If you're looking for a place to meet a client or do some work you may need to go to a different Starbucks.

Reviews.Author: Shari
Reviews.Content: Two stars for the very polite girl at the counter where I purchased a $25 gift card for a friend before our lunch at Table34 next door. I walked in at about 11:20 am on Friday, Jan 29th. It's a smaller Starbucks and there isn't much room to wait in line. I accidentally was standing in the incorrect place and a dark haired girl with short hair declared  the line is on the OTHER side  with a very obvious eye roll. She threw a dirty look at me and turned around to go back to what she was doing. I felt awful. When it was my turn I quickly grabbed the gift card purchased it and left. I will never return to that Starbucks again. I am a gold card member so I love my Starbucks but this girl was atrocious. She embarrassed me and I felt awful.

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Worst experience ever no clue what products they had or didn't have kid at front counter was rude and condescending. It's not my fault he had no idea what a pour over was. Won't see my business again

Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: This review is long overdue. My coworkers and I have been going here almost every work day for two years and we agree that it is by far the best Starbucks location around. I think the secret is out because this location is almost always busier than other ones in the area, even though it doesn't have a drive-thru. The wait is worth it though, or you can place a mobile order on the smartphone app to avoid the line.  The baristas are also super friendly and they make an effort to get to know you. They will memorize your drink if you come in regularly enough and they hardly ever mess it up. In the rare event they do, they will make it right.
